name: International Conference on Cancer and Oncology Research
content: The Organizing Committee of International Conference on Cancer and Oncology Research invite you to participate in the Cancer Conference, which will be held during May 30-31, 2024 at Rome, Italy The main theme of conference is “Exploring the Recent Research and Advancements in Cancer and Oncology Research”. This Conference will provide a unique opportunity for researchers, healthcare practitioners, paramedics and trauma care specialists from around the world to communicate and share innovative thoughts and practices designed to optimize patient care.
